message.raw:
Speed improvements

* Updated runviewer to default to not showing any plots.
* Resampling now only occurs on channels visible

Still a performance issue with pyqtgraph. Specifically, in pyqtgraph\graphicsItems\ViewBox\ViewBoxMenu.py inside method ViewBoxMenu.setViewList() there is a performance issue when adding the name of each graph to a QComboBox one at a time. Instead you should use QComboBox.addItems() to add all the names at once. I will contact the developer soon to suggest he patches it!

message:
Speed improvements

* Updated runviewer to default to not showing any plots.
* Resampling now only occurs on channels visible

Still a performance issue with pyqtgraph. Specifically, in pyqtgraph\graphicsItems\ViewBox\ViewBoxMenu.py inside method ViewBoxMenu.setViewList() there is a performance issue when adding the name of each graph to a QComboBox one at a time. Instead you should use QComboBox.addItems() to add all the names at once. I will contact the developer soon to suggest he patches it!
